task.name: enter-the-wild
textData:
This is the introduction.
Are you ready to enter the adventure? [yes|no]

task.name: deer-adventurer
textData: You leave your house and stand in a beautiful grassland. The landscape is amazing. The sun is shining, the birds are singing and the flowers are blooming.
You do some steps and admire a large oak. Suddenly two deers appear.
The deers stop and stare at you. You stretch out your arm in the deers' direction. One of them does a step back.
But after some seconds the second one does a few steps towards you, the first one follows with some distance of security.
You stand completely still and wait for the animal to touch your hand.
The deer's head is now only a few centimeters away from your hand.

Suddenly it snaps towards you! In panic you pull back your hand, but the deer already reached his target and runs away with your watch.
They both disappear in a small forest piece.
Do you (a) follow them or (b) go back home to get a new watch? [a/b]

task.name: the-warning
introductionTextData: You go deeper and deeper in the forest. In front of you a small old cabin appears.
You knock on the door and a small old man with a pipe opens. [enter "talk" to start a conversion]

welcome.botText:
Welcome, passenger!
What circumstance brings you to this lonely place?

observations.botText:
You're a lucky watchless man!
Through my window I observed two deers running against east. But hm....

warning.botText:
One should not roam around in these dark woods.
It's a strange place ful of magic and dangers. Many adventurers disappeared and were never seen again.
Don't go further!

a.text: That sounds too dangerous for a watch. I'll go back. *go back home*

b.text: I fear no little forest! *go deeper in the forest*
